wikitext.*:
On [[2 January]] [[1967]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Otto B. Lindhardt''' (of Gyldendals Bibliotek, the then future Danish publishers of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'').<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}, p. 685</ref><ref name=RC>{{HM|RC}}, pp. 750-1</ref>
*'''Subject:''' Guidelines for a Danish translation of ''The Lord of the Rings''.
*'''Publication:''' Quotes from the letter were published in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion]]'' and in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide|The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: I. Chronology]]''.
*'''Archive:''' Tolkien-[[Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin]] archive, [[HarperCollins]].
